name: TriggerOnCallPage
description:
Triggers a new On-Call Page in Datadog.

Use this tool to trigger a new On-Call Page in Datadog whenever immediate attention is required. Ideal for alerting on-call team members.

parameters.name: issue_summary
parameters.description: A short summary of the issue or context for the On-Call Page.

value_schema.description: A short summary of the issue or context.

parameters.name: tags_for_categorization
parameters.description: An array of tags for categorizing or filtering the On-Call page.

value_schema.description: Tags to help categorize or filter the page.

parameters.name: target_identifier
parameters.description: Identifier for the target, such as a team handle or user ID, used to specify the intended recipient of the On-Call Page.

value_schema.description: Identifier for the target (for example, team handle or user ID).

parameters.name: target_type
parameters.description: Specify the kind of target: 'team_id', 'team_handle', or 'user_id'.

parameters.name: page_title
parameters.description: The title of the On-Call Page. Provide a concise and clear title to identify the issue or alert.

parameters.name: on_call_page_urgency_level
parameters.description: Specifies the urgency level of the On-Call Page. Accepts 'low' or 'high'.

parameters.name: resource_type_for_on_call
parameters.description: Specify the type of resource for creating an On-Call Page. Use `pages`.

value_schema.description: The type of resource used when creating an On-Call Page.
